Label: GRHPR
Comment: Also called D-glycerate dehydrogenase (GDH), and hydroxypyruvate reductase</br>Abbreviated with GR or GRHPR

Label: LDH5
Comment: L-lactate dehydrogenase</br>Consists of four M-subunits (found in muscle and liver), coded by LDHA gene

Label: Unknown peroxisomalglyoxylate carrier
Comment: Cytosolic glyoxylate can enter the peroxisome but the carrier that mediates its entry has not been identified (Wanders et al. 2016).
